text: Nankai University or NKU (simplified Chinese: 南开大学; traditional Chinese: 南開大學;), is a famous university in Tianjin, China. It was founded by Yan Xiu and Zhang Boling in 1919. The first Premier of the People's Republic of China Zhou Enlai graduated from Nankai University. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Chern Institute of Mathematics * Institute of Applied Physics Category:Colleges and universities in the People's Republic of China Category:1919 establishments in Asia Category:20th-century establishments in China
title: Nankai University
